Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw

Class JColorInfoLabel

  • java.lang.Object

      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw.JColorInfoLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorChangeListener

    public class JColorInfoLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements ColorChangeListener
    A component that displays current selected foreground and background color in JVDraw using JColorArea's.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic
    See Also:
